Make a rooted NJ tree

Source: R/mitodrift.R
make_rooted_nj.Rd

Make a rooted NJ tree

Usage

make_rooted_nj(vmat, dist_method = "manhattan", ncores = 1)

Arguments

vmat

A matrix of cell-by-variable values

dist_method

The distance method to use

ncores

Number of threads for parallelDist::parDist (default: 1)

Value

A phylo object
